message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that. How about we settle for $160?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit far from $160. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?
